p: Calculation of MVI involved three distinct steps: 1) attribution of gradual scores to the variables presented in Table 1; 2) aggregation of the scores using arithmetic mean and subsequent standardization to form the indices shown in the orange boxes of Fig 3 and in Table 1; and 3) combination of the indices using the same procedures used for arithmetic mean and standardization. Fig 4 shows the steps of calculating all indicators and indices used in the present work, as well as the successive aggregation of these indices to generate the MVI.
